channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Stockholm)
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2020-10-13 19:00 Stockholm Indie Hackers October meetup! - Stockholm Indiehackers
item.description: Hi everyone! It’s October and time to share our progress, issues, and interests again! What have you been working on? What have you learned recently? We’re gonna try to meet in person again, at Anglaise unless someone has a better idea for a venue?

item.title: 2020-10-14 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee
item.description: Like to limit WIP (Work-In-Process), visualization of workflows and self-organizing teams? Want to meet others like you and learn more about Lean and Agile? We are few enthusiasts who meet every Wednesday morning since May 2010, to exchange thoughts and experiences over a cup ...

item.title: 2020-10-14 18:00 Finding your tech career path: experts' advice - My first IT job in Sweden
item.description: The IT sector is one area forecasted to offer many job opportunities between now and 2025, as the most in-demand professions will be engineers and IT specialists. During this session, IT professionals from UI UX Design, Front-End, and Python development fields, will sha...

item.title: 2020-11-05 17:00 Open Source Integration - It Is All About Integration - Stockholm
item.description: Niclas Tenggren and Arul Madoneraj will give som insights in open source integration, Do not miss this ocation. There is an additional slot available for anyone that would like to share.

item.title: 2020-11-26 17:00 WebAuth, Framtiden för autentisering på webben - Backend Developers Stockholm Meetup Group
item.description: Backend Developers Stockholm välkomnar er till årets första meetup som arrangeras tillsammans med Yubico och Utvecklarbolaget. Ämnet är "WebAuthn" som kommer att presenteras av Emil Lundberg på Yubico. Det är begränsat antal platser så först till kvarn.

item.title: 2020-11-12 18:00 STOCKHOLM TECH JOB FAIR 2020 - Stockholm TechMeetups
item.description: Welcome Employers and Job Seekers! Whether you are looking for a job or recruiting, Tech Job Fair is the place to be! The speed dating event for recruiting! Come to meet employers, ask questions, and make connections. This event will target local job seekers from...

item.title: 2020-10-20 17:30 The power of UX Design and what you should know - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Topic: - The Power of User Experience Design and what you should know Agenda: - A bit of history for context - Gain clarity about the buzzwords & titels you might have heard - How it works, what are the process and tools that can be used - Return...
